xml1.Brief_description: The winning amounts on the selected lines are not shown in the game field when the 'Cherry' symbols appear on all reels
xml1.Environment: Windows 10 Pro /Internet Explorer, Google Chrome, Yandex.Browser; Android/ Internet Explorer, Google Chrome, Yandex.Browser; IOS/ Google Chrome, Safari
xml1.Prerequisites: 1. The main page of the game is open; 2. Lines â€“ 2 is selected
xml1.Playback_steps: 1. Press the 'Spin' button until the 'Cherry' symbol appears on all reels
xml1.The_actual_result: Does not show the winning amounts on the selected lines
xml1.The_expected_result: Shows all the winnings on the lines, then a message appears about doubling the winnings ('X2')
xml1.Note: The error is also valid for when the 'Drain' symbols appear on all reels
